title: How is Emiway different from Eminem? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well as said both rappers rap fast in the home language so the classified equally fast In this specific reason , but the difference is that Eminem made it to where he wanted to be and earned his title fare , Rap God . And no1 can take that away But get the follow up title just below Eminem , but credit due to Emiway is honestly given where earned.
